### Appendix 1 - Intro to R

#### R {#glossary_r}

R refers to both a statistical programming language and the compiler (console) used to execute R code. Generally, when people refer to "R" they are referring to writing code in the R programming language. While you can interact with the R console directly, most often you will use a GUI like [RStudio](#glossary_rstudio)

See also [Appendix 1](#appendix_1)

#### RStudio {#glossary_rstudio}

An Integrated Development Environment (IDE) that makes it fun and easy to code in [R](#glossary_r).
